_comment: Created by EFisher on 26/10/2015 10:04:00 using v2.7
title: How has the frequency of MRSA infections changed?
analysis_commentary: In 2007, the level of hospital acquired MRSA infections also became a major national concern, similar to C difficile. The reduction in the number of MRSA cases has followed a similar trajectory to that of C Difficile, however, this trend continued in 2014/15. An 82% reduction in all reported cases between 2007 and 2015, and an 82% reduction in trust apportioned cases between 2008 and 2015.
data_source: Health Protection Agency, Mandatory surveillance of bacteraemia
